page.title: 10PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Tig Ball.In tig ball you choose a person who is on.He then gets the ball and aims the ball at somone.When he has hit somone with the ball they are on. Block.When we play Block somone is on at the wall or tree.He counts 100 while everyone hides then he says "ready or not".He goes to look for everyone .If he sees any one he runs back to the block and says "Block out" and that persons name and 1,2,3 and he is on but if he does not get to the block before the person he has to look for someone else.When he has found everyone the 1st one found is 'on'. British Bulldog. Everybody lines up at one side of the playground. The one 'on' shouts "British Bulldogs charge" and everyone rushes across the playground. The catcher grabs someone who joins him. Last to be caught wins.
